text: Boris Maksimovich Gurevich (; 23 March 1931 â€“ 10 January 1995) was a Soviet wrestler. He won gold medals at the 1952 Olympics, the 1953 world championships, and the 1958 world championships. Gurevich first trained in gymnastics and later took up wrestling in 1948. After retiring from competitions he coached wrestlers in Moscow. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Boris Gurevich (wrestler, born 1931)
